short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start talk with your leads in any platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dealer Tech Global Extension

Text from any CRM or web app seamlessly. Access the robust and versatile features of Dealer Tech Global's texting-for-business software directly from your CRM or any web app with the Dealer Tech Global Extension for Google Chrome. Send and receive text messages using your existing business phone number, manage contacts, and review all conversations without interrupting your workflow. Dealer Tech Global streamlines texting with customers, ensuring it's fast, efficient, and hassle-free.

Continue or initiate text conversations effortlessly:
 - Leverage advanced features like attachments, emojis, templates, dynamic fields, and scheduled texts 
 - Sync all messages across platforms 
 - Phone number auto-detection enables one-click texting to any number on a web page

Manage, edit, and view contact information swiftly:
 - Update contact details in seconds
 - Associate contact details with new conversations

Automatically populate contacts and send group messages on-the-fly:
 - Access your saved Dealer Tech Global contacts
 - Send group messages to contacts

Track all conversations by contact:
 - Organize and handle ongoing text conversations
 - Monitor unread messages

*** NOTE: You need a Dealer Tech Global account to utilize this Chrome Extension. To sign up, please visit https://dealertechglobal.ai. For inquiries or suggestions, contact us at info@dealertechglobal.com. ***
